stories.text:
I am not just talking about HN users but everyone. I read a stat saying 98% of Facebook users use it on mobile. I can't find if that means exclusively.

The reason I ask is that I am creating a social web app that is desktop focus. Desktop is my preference and I feel it suits the type of app I am building better.. but will there be anyone to use it?
stories.title: Ask HN: How many people use the web from their desktops?

stories.text: I haven't been able to get this idea out of my kind that to be a successful CEO, you need to be a sociopath. Somehow it feels like decent people with decent products just don't make it.
stories.title: Why do I feel like you need to be a sociopath to succeed?
